indic_aug.depparse package¶

class indic_aug.depparse.DepParseAugmentor(src_input_path, tgt_input_path, mode, alpha, src_freq_dict=None, tgt_freq_dict=None, stanza_dir='C:\\Users\\Deepak\\stanza_resources', augment=True, random_state=1)[source]¶

Bases: indic_aug.globals.Augmentor

Class to augment parallel corpora by dependency parsing technique (refer: Duan et al. [3]).

Constructor method.

Parameters

  • src_input_path (str) – Path to aligned source corpus.

  • tgt_input_path (str) – Path to aligned target corpus, corresponding to the above source corpus.

  • mode (str) – Same as for depparse_aug.

  • alpha (float) – Same as for DepParseTree.

  • src_freq_dict (dict) – Same as for freq_dict in transforms.depparse_aug.

  • tgt_freq_dict (dict) – Same as for freq_dict in transforms.depparse_aug.

  • stanza_dir (str) – Path to directory containing stanza models (the default is ~/stanza_resources on doing a stanza.download).

  • augment (bool) – Performs augmentation if True, else returns original pair of sentences.

  • random_state (int) – Seed for the random number generator.

Submodules¶

indic_aug.depparse.depparse module¶

class indic_aug.depparse.depparse.DepParseAugmentor(src_input_path, tgt_input_path, mode, alpha, src_freq_dict=None, tgt_freq_dict=None, stanza_dir='C:\\Users\\Deepak\\stanza_resources', augment=True, random_state=1)[source]¶

Bases: indic_aug.globals.Augmentor

Class to augment parallel corpora by dependency parsing technique (refer: Duan et al. [3]).

Constructor method.

Parameters

  • src_input_path (str) – Path to aligned source corpus.

  • tgt_input_path (str) – Path to aligned target corpus, corresponding to the above source corpus.

  • mode (str) – Same as for depparse_aug.

  • alpha (float) – Same as for DepParseTree.

  • src_freq_dict (dict) – Same as for freq_dict in transforms.depparse_aug.

  • tgt_freq_dict (dict) – Same as for freq_dict in transforms.depparse_aug.

  • stanza_dir (str) – Path to directory containing stanza models (the default is ~/stanza_resources on doing a stanza.download).

  • augment (bool) – Performs augmentation if True, else returns original pair of sentences.

  • random_state (int) – Seed for the random number generator.

class indic_aug.depparse.depparse.DepParseTree(sent)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a dependency parsing tree.

Constructor method.

Parameters

sent (stanza.models.common.doc.Sentence) – Sentence for which dependency parse tree is to be created. Do NOT pass a str.

class Root[source]¶

Bases: object

Representation of <root> as class with static attribute text for compatibility with stanza.models.common.doc.Word.

text = '<root>'¶
depths2list()[source]¶

Returns depths of all nodes in tree as a list. Each element in the list is itself a list in the format [<word_index>, <word>, <depth>].

index2word(idx)[source]¶

Returns word corresponding to an index.

Parameters

idx (int) – Index for array self.words.

qprobs2list()[source]¶

Returns q-probabilities (refer Duan et al. [3]) of all nodes in tree as a list. Each element in the list is itself a list in the format [<word_index>, <word>, <q_probability>].

save_tree(output_path, shape='box', style='filled', fillcolor='mediumorchid', fontname='Courier', fontcolor='black', edgecolor='black')[source]¶

Saves dependency parse tree to a GraphViz DOT format file.

Parameters

  • output_path (str) – Path to output DOT file.

  • shape (str) – Shape of boundary box of node, defaults to ‘box’. Refer GraphViz docs for allowed values.

  • style (str) – Style of node, defaults to ‘filled’. Refer GraphViz docs for allowed values.

  • fillcolor (str) – Fill color of node, defaults to ‘mediumorchid’. Allowed values are X11 color strings.

  • fontname (str) – Font to use for node labels, defaults to ‘Courier’. Refer GraphViz docs for allowed values.

  • fontcolor (str) – Color of font for node labels, defaults to ‘black’. Allowed values are X11 color strings.

  • edgecolor (str) – Color of edges, defaults to ‘black’. Allowed values are X11 color strings.

score(alpha=0.1)[source]¶

Calculates score of node in dependency parse tree in accordance with Duan et al. [3].

Parameters

alpha (float, optional) – Hyperparameter which controls likelihood of changing, defaults to 0.1.

Returns

Score of node.

Return type

float

scores2list()[source]¶

Returns score (refer Duan et al. [3]) of all nodes in tree as a list. Each element in the list is itself a list in the format [<word_index>, <word>, <score>].

softmax2list()[source]¶

Returns softmax output (refer Duan et al. [3]) of all nodes in tree as a list. Each element in the list is itself a list in the format [<word_index>, <word>, <softmax_output>].

indic_aug.depparse.depparse.depparse_aug(sent, mode, alpha, freq_dict=None)[source]¶

Performs augmentation on one sentence (and NOT a document of sentences, as some of the other augmentorss) by dependency parsing (refer Duan et al. [3]).

freq_dict is required only if mode is ‘replace’, it is ignored otherwise.

Parameters

  • sent (stanza.models.common.doc.Sentence) – Sentence to be augmented. Do NOT pass a str or a list of str.

  • mode (str) – Action to perform after scores are extracted. Valid values are given in globals.py.

  • alpha (float) – Same as for DepParseTree.score.

  • freq_dict (dict, optional) – Dictionary of word-frequency pairs as returned by vocab.score2freq_vocab, defaults to None.

Returns

Augmented sentence.

Return type

str
